description: Component that displays an alert. ### Accessibility For Alert component it's not required to pass any options for accessibility. It internally handles accessibility for title and message:  - title is linked with aria-labelledby.  - message is linked with aria-describedby.

autofocus.description: Whether the button in the alert is focused on initial load. Defaults to false.

dismissible.description: Whether the alert can be dismissed. Defaults to false.

message.description: The message of the alert. If nothing provided, wouldn't be displayed. It is internally linked with aria-describedby.

modifier.description: The type modifier for the alert. Defaults to 'error'.

primaryActionButtonText.description: The title of the primary action button.

supportiveLinkText.description: The title of the supportive link button.

title.description: The title of the alert. Will throw an error if unset. It is internaly linked with aria-labelledby.

close.description: The callback fired upon closing the alert.

primaryActionButtonClick.description: The callback fired upon clicking primary action button.

supportiveLinkClick.description: The callback fired upon clicking supportive link button.
